org.netbeans.modules.junit.api

Class JUnitSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.java.testrunner.CommonSettings
      • org.netbeans.modules.junit.api.JUnitSettings

  • public class JUnitSettings
extends org.netbeans.modules.java.testrunner.CommonSettings
    Options for JUnit module, control behavior of test creation and execution.
